description: This file defines a Python class CerebrasOpenAI that extends OpenAILike, providing methods to prepare request parameters and format messages for the Cerebras API, including handling tools and message formatting.

classes.name: CerebrasOpenAI
classes.description: A class representing an interface to the Cerebras OpenAI API, with methods to generate request parameters and format messages.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Generates request parameters for the Cerebras API, including handling tools and parallel tool calls.

methods.name: _format_message
methods.description: Formats a Message object into a dictionary suitable for the Cerebras API, handling roles, content, tool calls, and responses.
